name: LOUD on Planet X
description: Defend your stage with music in this new indie rhythm game featuring Tegan and Sara, CHVRCHES, Lights, Metric, METZ, F*cked Up, HEALTH, Purity Ring, Little Dragon, Austra, Shad, Cadence Weapon, July Talk, Monomyth and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Well the tracks selection is good I have to give that to the developers which there was more though. I would also like to say that this game is not clearly made for PC as in my opinion the game is made for mobile phones or tablets. Would I recommend this game for the mobile platform? Yes. But in PC I think not.  EDIT: I might recommend it if it had trading cards, more selection of artists and keyboard commands.
